title: City Homes Two-storied Semi-Detached Luxury Homes for Sale
details:
CH and RE’s, Brand New City Homes Housing Project in Embuldeniya, Nugegoda comprises of beautiful and immaculate homes just a few steps away from most sought after city life but not compromising the awe of the peaceful, abundantly green environment.
The property is built to host 10 semi-detached - two story houses and 6 apartments forming a perfectly safe 16 unit, mixed housing-development project. The location is ideal for anyone looking to live an easy and peaceful city life with quick access to Nugegoda town and other key roadways leading to urban cities such as Maharagama (4.5 KM), High- Level Road, Sri Jayawardenapura Kotte and more places.

Our fine homes include:-
- Master Bed Room with A/C and Attached Bathroom
- 2 Bedrooms with a common Bathroom
- Spacious living and dining areas
- Pantry with granite work top
- Elegantly designed family areas
- Maid’s room and toilet
- Balconies
- Roof terrace
- Modern Interior and Exterior fittings.
-Spacious Car Parks/Garages
